revision.text: {{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = 2T2R 802.11ax (WiFi 6) WLAN/BT Combo Card |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = MediaTek |model = MT7921 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 09/26/2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/MediaTek_MT7921_Reference_Design |sernum = |wlclass = AX1800 |series = |if = M.2 |if_bus_version = 2.1 |ifconnector = |formfactor = module |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = RAS-MT7921 |icid = 7542A-MT7921 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = MediaTek;MT7921A;MT7921AN; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MHF4 |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax |802.11ax = 574/1201 |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = [https://wireless.wiki.kernel.org/en/users/drivers/mediatek mt76] |windriv = ''Win 10'' |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = WiFi 6, Bluetooth 5.0 LE, WPA3, Wi-Fi Direct, WMM, Wi-Fi Agile Multiband, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = reference design |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/25/2020 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *WPA3-Enterprise, WPA3-Personal, Wi-Fi Direct, WMM, Wi-Fi Agile Multiband The full part of the ''[[MediaTek]]'' chip used in this device is MT7921AN ? {{WiFiCert|WFA100148|11/05/2020}} :[https://api.cert.wi-fi.org/api/certificate/download/public?variantId=16519 WFA100148] (2020-11-05) ==Notes== ===Models=== *'''MediaTek MT7921''' - 2x2 802.11ax (WiFi 6) + BT/BLE Combo Card *'''MediaTek MT7921K''' - 2x2 802.11ax (WiFi 6E) + BT/BLE Combo Card *'''MediaTek MT7633E''' - 802.11bgn Wi-Fi Adapter - 14c3:7633 (PCIe) :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7633&SUBSYS_197C103C - 103c:197c (HP) *'''MediaTek MT7662E''' - 802.11ac Wireless Adapter - 14c3:7662 (PCIe) *'''MediaTek MT7663S''' - 802.11ac WLAN/BT Combo Module - 037a:7663 (SDIO) :SD\VID_037a&PID_7663&FN_1 - MT7663S (Wi-Fi) :SD\VID_037a&PID_7663&FN_2 - MT7663S (BT) *'''MediaTek MT7612U''' - 802.11abgn/ac WLAN/BT Combo Module - 0e8d:7612 (USB) :2T2R 802.11abgn/ac, USB 3.0, WFA50185 *'''MediaTek MT7668U''' - 802.11abgn/ac WLAN/BT Combo Module - 0e8d:7668 (USB) :2T2R 802.11abgn/ac, USB 3.0/UART (BT), BT 5.0 LE *'''MediaTek MT7668S''' - 802.11abgn/ac WLAN/BT Combo Module - 037a:7668 ? (SDIO) :2T2R 802.11abgn/ac, SDIO 3.0/UART (BT), BT 5.0 LE ==See also== *[[MediaTek MT7902 Reference Design]] :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/RAS-MT7902/ RAS-MT7902] (2022-05-03) *[[MediaTek MT7921K Reference Design]] :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/RAS-MT7921K/ RAS-MT7921K] (2021-01-05) *[[MediaTek MT7921 Reference Design]] :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/RAS-MT7921 RAS-MT7921] (2020-09-25) *[[MediaTek MT7663 Reference Design]] :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/RAS-MT7663 RAS-MT7663] (2020-01-06) *[[MediaTek MT7630E Reference Design]] :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/RAS-MT7630E RAS-MT7630E] (2013-01-07) [[Category:English Documentation]]
